message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a fair share, now it's your turn to decide.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think it's still fair. Your turn to decide!
Not bad, but I was hoping for a bit more. I'll pass on this offer and make a counteroffer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a bit more. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need to get a bit more too. Let's try to find a middle ground.
Still a bit too far off from what I'm looking for. I'll try to make another counteroffer.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I still think I can do better. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I'm not willing to give up yet. I think we can find a better compromise. Let's try again!
Alright, I think we've been negotiating long enough. I'll take this offer and we can finally settle this.
